title: Debian LXC
textContent:
Debian LXC 
                Debian Linux is a distribution that emphasizes free software. It supports many hardware platforms.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Debian LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/debian.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 2GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
outerHTML:
Debian LXC

Debian Linux is a distribution that emphasizes free software. It supports many hardware platforms.

To create a new Proxmox VE Debian LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/debian.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 2GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
